languages.text: {n}Пухлый старик в богатых одеяниях исповедника почтительно добавляет:{/n} "Еще предшественник моей предшественницы поведал пастве о великом жертвовании ткачей — спасении судна от слуг Архиврага. Ценой тому были алые реки, залившие палубы от мостика до самого днища. Кровью флагмана стали они, пульсирующими венами его, бьющимся сердцем его. И снискала Кровавая паутина благосклонность династии фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}Пухлый старик в богатых одеяниях исповедника почтительно добавляет:{/n} "Еще предшественник моей предшественницы поведал пастве о великом жертвовании ткачей — спасении судна от слуг Архиврага. Ценой тому были алые реки, залившие палубы от мостика до самого днища. Кровью флагмана стали они, пульсирующими венами его, бьющимся сердцем его. И снискала Кровавая паутина благосклонность династии фон Валанциус".

languages.text: {n}A plump old man in the rich robes of a confessor adds respectfully,{/n} "My predecessor's predecessor once delivered a sermon about how the spinners saved this vessel from the servants of the Archenemy. The Bloodspun Web paid the price in blood, a river of scarlet that flooded the decks from bridge to bilge. They became the blood of the flagship, the pulse in its veins, and the beat of its heart. Their great sacrifice earned them the favour of House von Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}Пухлый старик в богатых одеяниях исповедника почтительно добавляет:{/n} "Еще предшественник моей предшественницы поведал пастве о великом жертвовании ткачей — спасении судна от слуг Архиврага. И снискала Кровавая паутина благосклонность династии фон Валанциус".

languages.text: {n}Un anciano rollizo con una ostentosa túnica de confesor añade con reverencia:{/n} «El predecesor de mi predecesor explicó una vez en un sermón cómo los tejedores salvaron esta nave de los sirvientes del Archienemigo. La Red Sanguinolenta pagó con sangre; un río escarlata que inundó las cubiertas, desde el puente hasta las cloacas. Se convirtieron en la sangre de la nave insignia, el pulso en sus venas y el latido de su corazón. Su gran sacrificio les otorgó el favor de la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: {n}A plump old man in the rich robes of a confessor adds respectfully,{/n} "My predecessor's predecessor once delivered a sermon about how the spinners saved this vessel from the servants of the Archenemy. The Bloodspun Web paid the price in blood, a river of scarlet that flooded the decks from bridge to bilge. They became the blood of the flagship, the pulse in its veins, and the beat of its heart. Their great sacrifice earned them the favour of House von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}聴罪師の豊かなローブを身に着けたふくよかな老人は、敬意とともに告げる。{/n}「私の前任者のそのまた前任者はかつて、織り手がいかにしてこの船を渾沌の勢力の手下から救ったのかについての説教をしました。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、血の代償を払いました。 ブリッジから船底まで、甲板は緋色の川と化したのです。彼らは旗艦の血となり、その脈動となり、心臓の鼓動となった。彼らの偉大な犠牲は、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の信頼を得たのです」
languages.original_text: {n}A plump old man in the rich robes of a confessor adds respectfully,{/n} "My predecessor's predecessor once delivered a sermon about how the spinners saved this vessel from the servants of the Archenemy. The Bloodspun Web paid the price in blood, a river of scarlet that flooded the decks from bridge to bilge. They became the blood of the flagship, the pulse in its veins, and the beat of its heart. Their great sacrifice earned them the favour of House von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}一位体态发福，身穿告解神父华贵长袍的老人恭敬地补充道。{/n}“我的前前任牧师曾经布道过，讲述织网者是如何从混沌大敌的仆人手中拯救了这艘船。织血罗网付出了鲜血的代价，他们的鲜血流满了整个舰桥到底层甲板。他们成为了这艘旗舰的血液，血管中的脉搏，以及心脏跳动的节拍。他们付出了巨大的牺牲，也因此赢得了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的青睐。”
languages.original_text: {n}A plump old man in the rich robes of a confessor adds respectfully,{/n} "My predecessor's predecessor once delivered a sermon about how the spinners saved this vessel from the servants of the Archenemy. The Bloodspun Web paid the price in blood, a river of scarlet that flooded the decks from bridge to bilge. They became the blood of the flagship, the pulse in its veins, and the beat of its heart. Their great sacrifice earned them the favour of House von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}Ein korpulenter alter Mann in den prächtigen Roben eines Konfessors fügt respektvoll hinzu:{/n} "Mein der Vorgänger meines Vorgängers hat einmal eine Predigt darüber gehalten, wie die Spinner dieses Schiff vor den Dienern des Erzfeindes gerettet haben. Das Blutgesponnene Netz hat den Preis in Blut bezahlt, ein roter Fluss, der die Decks von Brücke bis Bilge überflutete. Sie sind zum Blut des Flaggschiffs geworden, zum Puls in seinen Adern, zum Pochen seines Herzens. Durch ihr großes Opfer haben sie sich die Gunst des Hauses von Valancius verdient."
languages.original_text: {n}A plump old man in the rich robes of a confessor adds respectfully,{/n} "My predecessor's predecessor once delivered a sermon about how the spinners saved this vessel from the servants of the Archenemy. The Bloodspun Web paid the price in blood, a river of scarlet that flooded the decks from bridge to bilge. They became the blood of the flagship, the pulse in its veins, and the beat of its heart. Their great sacrifice earned them the favour of House von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}Un vieil homme grassouillet, vêtu de la robe somptueuse d'un confesseur, ajoute sur un ton respectueux :{/n} « Le prédécesseur de mon prédécesseur a un jour fait tout un sermon sur la façon dont les tisseurs ont sauvé ce navire des serviteurs du Grand Ennemi. La Toile de Sang a payé le prix ultime, répandant une rivière écarlate qui a inondé tous les ponts, de la passerelle à la cale. Ils sont devenus le sang et le pouls du vaisseau amiral. Le battement même de son cœur. Leur grand sacrifice leur a valu les faveurs de la maison von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: {n}A plump old man in the rich robes of a confessor adds respectfully,{/n} "My predecessor's predecessor once delivered a sermon about how the spinners saved this vessel from the servants of the Archenemy. The Bloodspun Web paid the price in blood, a river of scarlet that flooded the decks from bridge to bilge. They became the blood of the flagship, the pulse in its veins, and the beat of its heart. Their great sacrifice earned them the favour of House von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}Günah çıkarıcılara ait şık bir cübbe kuşanmış tombul ihtiyar adam, konuşmaya hürmetle devam ediyor.{/n} "Selefimin selefi, bir vakitler dokurların bu gemiyi Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarından nasıl kurtardıklarına dair bir vaaz vermiş. Kanipi Ağı, bunun bedelini dökülen kanlarıyla ödemiş. Köprüden sintineye kadar tüm güvertelerde kan kızılı bir nehir akarak sancak gemisinin kanına, damarlarındaki nabza ve kalbinin atışlarına dönüşmüş. Yaptıkları bu büyük fedakârlık sayesinde von Valancius Hanesi'nin imtiyazını kazanmışlar."
languages.original_text: {n}A plump old man in the rich robes of a confessor adds respectfully,{/n} "My predecessor's predecessor once delivered a sermon about how the spinners saved this vessel from the servants of the Archenemy. The Bloodspun Web paid the price in blood, a river of scarlet that flooded the decks from bridge to bilge. They became the blood of the flagship, the pulse in its veins, and the beat of its heart. Their great sacrifice earned them the favour of House von Valancius."
